title: Senior Design
description: Senior design project requiring student to formulate a project plan with an off-campus enterprise. Includes specific milestones, targets, and evaluation criteria.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ISYE 3025 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 3133 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 3232 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 3044 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ISYE 4031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
